meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ernestine Gardner John Kozempel Matt Jackson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7142.

td.p: Ernestine Gardner, an administrative assistant from South Bend, Indiana
John Kozempel, an I.T. consultant from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Matt Jackson, a paralegal from Washington, D.C. (whose 7-day cash winnings total $190,601)

tr.td: THE I.T. GUY
PUBLISHED FIRST
STATE OF EMERGENCY
TV
A BILL IN CONGRESS
"UN" ENDING

tr.td: Matt
John
Ernestine
THE "I.T." GUY
(Alex: ...but this time, the "I.T." refers to the initials of a person.)
BIBLICAL CITIES
WEATHER
I AM HISTORY!
SWORDS
THESE WORDS COULD GO ON A DIET

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_2_4', 'clue_DJ_2_4_stuck', '(Alex: That is correct, but before I ask you to make your next selection, I have some bad news. I erred a few moments ago. In your response to Turgenev in the "I.T." category, because "I" and "T" are in quotation marks, we needed the first and the last name. So we have to deduct $4,000 from you. That brings you down to $33,200. You\'re still in command of the board. And we\'re running out of time. Make another selection.)

Babylon

Matt
')
